snippet: MARTIN--Susan Melvoin, beloved mother, daughter, sister, teacher, and friend, died peacefully at home at age 60. She had been living with ALS for five years. A funeral service is planned for 11am, Wednesday, June 22, at Ansche Chesed Synagogue, 251 West 100th St. The family has designated The ALS Foundation (for research) or MACAngels (for support of those living with ALS) for memorial contributions. 1/3
